DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine whether use Ylang Ylang essential oil dermal application inhalation alters perception anxiety self-esteem physiological parameter u blood pressure temperature .
DOC.detailed_description: 34 nurse University Hospital participate study randomize three group : one receive Ylang Ylang Essential Oil cutaneous route , second receive Essential Oil inhalation third ( placebo ) receive essence Ylang ylang cutaneous route .
